s3240: Nineteenth year: extinguished Liang. Liang was fond of city walls, did not reside in them; the people were exhausted, startled each other, therefore perished.
s3273: Thirty-third year: seized Song Xiang Gong, released him again.
s3284: Fourteenth year: Shu Dai returned again to Zhou.
s3286: Fifth year: returned the king's younger brother Dai.
s3287: Thirteenth year: Crown Prince Yu was hostage in Qin, fled and returned.
s3290: Thirteenth year: battle of Hong, Chu defeated the duke.
s3295: Thirty-fifth year: the duke went to Chu, Song attacked us.
s3302: Sixth year: attacked Song because they did not join the alliance.
s3303: Fourteenth year: Yu was established as Hui Gong.
s3304: Twenty-third year: welcomed Chong Er from Chu, treated him with great courtesy, married him to a daughter. Chong Er wished to return.
s3305: Thirty-fifth year: Chong Er passed through, treated him with great courtesy.
s3306: Fourteenth year: the duke died ill from the Hong battle.
s3307: Twenty-third year: Chong Er came from Qi and passed through, was disrespectful.
s3310: Sixteenth year: Chong Er passed through, was disrespectful; Xi Fu Ji privately befriended him.
s3311: Thirty-sixth year: Chong Er passed through, was disrespectful; Shu Zhan admonished.
s3316: Sixteenth year: the king fled to Si. Si was Zheng territory.
s3320: Twenty-fourth year: used troops to assist Chong Er.
s3332: Seventeenth year: Jin installed the king.
s3336: Twenty-fifth year: wished to bring in the king, army on the Yellow River.
s3354: Third year: violated Chu alliance, became close to Jin.
